examples.example: 一群充满活力的年轻人正在公园里欢快地玩耍。

translate.english: A group of energetic young people are playing happily in the park.

examples.example: 一群志愿者在社区里热情地帮助有需要的人们。

translate.english: A group of volunteers help people in need passionately in the community.

examples.example: 一群可爱的孩子在草地上尽情地嬉戏。

translate.english: A group of lovely children are playing heartily on the grass.
